Suds By The Park Laundry Service
Suds By The Park Laundry Service

adrFormatAddress: 73 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Convenient and fast laundry and fold service. I’ve been going here for 2+ years and they’ve never lost or damaged any of my items. They offer delivery as well.

Prices are good considering it’s Manhattan and cheaper than other places in the neighborhood. Quality service and speed will have your clothes ready only hours later. Very friendly staff and they’re always attentive to any special requests as well.

text.text:

originalText.text:
I've tried several laundry places in the hood since I moved here last May, and Suds By The Park is by far the best I've experienced.

Jose and team are doing a great job to always follow my specific requests.  I have sensitive skin and can only use unscented natural detergent in cold wash and tumble dry low.  I can also leave my own detergent there instead of carrying it with me every time.  Besides, their service is ultra fast; I often have my entire laundry (15-25 lbs. a week) done within a few hours.  To me, that's making a difference!  Moreover, the pricing is fair considering prime Manhattan standards, and gets lower as the weight of the laundry gos up.

I hope they sustain the quality of service and speed.  I strongly recommend this laundry place.

originalText.text:
I have been using the service of this laundry for a year now, and they have always been very professional, friendly and attentive to requirements.

They are also punctual with laundry deliveries and attentive to offer you the best laundry service for personal and bed linen: high quality detergents, air or machine drying, whatever you might need. Mauricio, Luis and all the staff are really nice. I appreciate the excellent service they offer.

text.text:

originalText.text: Do not bring your clothes here. No regard for your clothes, they do it as fast and cheaply as possible. We’ve brought our stuff here max 5 times and won’t be doing so again. In that short span they’ve somehow lost multiple items of clothing and fried/shrunk/discolored multiple others. How do you lose people’s clothing? How are you losing sweaters and pairs of pants? Why are you blasting people’s clothes on maximum heat and ruining the fabric? Why/how are you turning white clothes into beige? Do you have any regard for people’s things or just trying to extract every cent possible? You’d think a laundry service would a) not lose the laundry and b) not ruin what they didn’t already lose. Terrible service.

Terrible service.

originalText.text: I’ve been using their same-day drop-off/pickup service since June 2021 (over two years now) for my sheets/towels/blankets and they’ve always done a great job. They have even given me two free laundry bags recently — I used to use trash bags every time to bring them my dirty stuff. Would definitely recommend this place.
